title: Altering glycopeptide antibiotic biosynthesis through mutasynthesis allows incorporation of fluorinated phenylglycine residues
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00140K, Paper

Irina Voitsekhovskaia, Y. T. Candace Ho, Christoph Klatt, Anna Mueller, Daniel Machell, Yi Jiun Tan, Maxine Treisman, Mara Bingel, Ralf B. Schittenhelm, Julien Tailhades, Andreas Kulik, Martin Maier, Gottfried Otting, Wolfgang Wohlleben, Tanja Schneider, Max Cryle, Evi Stegmann
Glycopeptide antibiotics (GPAs) are peptide natural products used as last resort treatments for antibiotic resistant bacterial infections. They are produced by the sequential activities of a linear nonribosomal peptide synthetase...
